about_the_game:
You've grown tired of their experiments and constantly being used as their tool of oppression. Sai-Corp developed new weapons that'll soon phase you out. And then what? Do they throw you away? Do they keep you as an experiment? No, don't let them choose for you like they always have. It's time to stand against Sai-Corp and earn the freedom they stole from you.

Pandora is a third-person action-adventure hack n slash game that combines teleportation and combat abilities. Take on the role of Phase, a cyber-enhanced super-soldier detained by their creator, Sai-Corp. Escape the orbital testing facility and earn the freedom they stole from you long ago.



Fluid Movement: Use Phase’s training and cyber-teleportation abilities to experience an engaging move set. A merge of basic and complex movement abilities that give you options when avoiding attacks from enemies or when traversing the broken facility.



Advanced Combat: Building on the fluid movement, the game gives Phase his favorite weapons, a katana, and his teleportation dagger. Combine Phase’s move set with his sword-slashing abilities to defeat anyone trying to stop you.



Enticing Environment: Utilize the different abilities while traversing the destroyed Sai-Corp Orbital Testing Facility and discover the environment that imprisoned Phase for so long.

content_descriptors.notes: We have the main character escape a prison facility, and he engages with hostiles on his path. He uses a cybernetic sword and dagger to slash guards who are cyberenhanced beings. The ultimate objective is to destroy the boss who is a mech.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 7th gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Intel or AMD integrated videocards are not recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel Core I7 9th gen
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Any RTX graphics card could be better
